item.title: RoatPkz | 24/7 | PK | Spawn & Master | Lots of Players
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Yeah, I wouldn’t recommend this server at all. I enjoy pking on occasion, but I mostly get on them and watch some fights to relax and whatnot, the people who play it consistently attacked me (expected) and basically flamed me and followed me around until I took one step past the wild line to ags spec me. It’s a cool server but the community is absolute garbage.

Read full topic

item.title: RoatPkz | 24/7 | PK | Spawn & Master | Lots of Players
item.dc:creator: @MoonSuns MoonSuns
item.description:
@MoonSuns wrote:

Loveandpower:

^ what he said, and what I am referring to is that that generally means donors have the best gear while a regular player would not. With all the crappy combat systems out there torva/primal armor in a pk system… is just unbeatable 99% of the time

Not at all. Generally the most common gear Ive seen that is used by both donators and non donators would be bandos or any barrows sets. There is no primal and torva…

The best sets (vesta, zuriel, morrigans and Statius) can all be bought in the PKPTS shop. Only vesta can be bought from buying donator boxes, but housing ever see someone pking in vesta as no one will risk it.

Read full topic

item.title: RoatPkz | 24/7 | PK | Spawn & Master | Lots of Players
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Phat Pink Phat
item.description:
@Pink_Phat wrote:

[quote=“MoonSuns, post:5, topic:468179”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=585140.msg4158902#msg4158902 date=1352878817]
anybody else find it sad how its all donors on front page of highscores ~^ what does that tell you about the pk eco…
[/quote]

It shows that the top players are so hooked for it, they want to support the server. It tells you nothing about the PK eco.[/quote]
Most of the people on the first page are donators, people will assume that you’re giving donators huge benefits that regular players cannot earn themselves.

EDIT: Just found this: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,555250.msg4065276.html#msg4065276

And if you had cared to read the rules, you will have noticed only one advertisement is allowed per server. Please be more careful.

Read full topic
